about-range: Tibetan Momos | Sino-American Rolls | Bambaiyya Pav Bhaji | Indo-Chinese Chilli Chicken | Syrian burgers & more!
about-altText: Thank you.  We are upgrading to serve you better.  Check back in a few days.
about-fastPrep: Freshly prepared. It takes time. But not too much!
about-vegNonvegSeparation: Special care to keep oil and utensils for veg and non-veg separate.
about-possibilities: Enjoy tasty meals by the canal side or simply, grab & go! Talk to us for a late night delivery or party needs. We do it all!
whyUs-message1: Natural colors. Fresh Oil. Homemade chutneys. Live Preparations. Quality ingredients. Low salt. No MSG.
whyUs-message2: We serve a mix of western and Indian fast foods. Variety is the spice of life. You get it all under the desiFirangi roof.
whyUs-message3: We serve the cheapest food in town for the quality we are committed to providing our every customer.
menu-desc1: Vegetables and homemade patties between sesame buns
menu-desc2: An iconic, spicy, buttery Bambaiyya street food
menu-desc3: Thin crispy panfried shells stuffed with carrots, radish and onions
menu-desc4: Paneer & vegetable cubes stir fried in 5 Indo-Chinese sauces
menu-desc5: Pan-seared veg momos served with 3 homemade sauces
menu-desc6: Steamed veg momos served with homemade sauces
menu-desc7: Stir-fried Haka noodles with flame-seared vegetables
menu-desc8: Mixed veg soup spiced with black peppers
menu-desc9: Marinated chicken pieces stir fried in 5 Indo-Chinese sauces
menu-desc11: Steamed veg momos served with homemade sauces
menu-desc12: Pan-seared chicken momos served with homemade sauces
menu-desc14: Aloo tikki with yogurt, tamarind and green chilli sauces
services-service1Desc1: Drive to our location for a relaxing chat with friends or enjoy the canal view across the table.
services-service1Desc2: While we are primed for take-aways, the location offers a fantastic canal side dine-in. Parking space is plenty. We keep the surroundings clean.
services-service2Desc1: Food tastes a tad better on a couch pointing at your favorite TV show!
services-service2Desc2: We offer tasty pick-ups in hygienic packagings. Be sure to ask for extra servings of our delightful sauces. In case you need to re-heat, be sure to ask the Chef for tips.
services-service3Desc1: In case you are throwing a birthday party or it is just a happy celebration with colleagues, ask us how we can make it better.
services-service3Desc2: We offer timely delivers and bulk discounts for party orders.
services-service3Desc2inquiry: for inquiries or to make a booking.
services-service4Desc1: For all your party or large gathering needs, if you go for Chinese items, burgers or Jammu's iconic kaladi kulcha then you need live cooking.
services-service4Desc2: Whatsapp or call +91 98679 10690 for inquiries or to make a booking. Ask for special, exclusive dishes when you ask for our live-Chef.
services-service5Desc1: Feast your taste buds with unlimited servings of desiFirangi's top 20 dishes of the week: Jammu street food, Tandoori Tadka, Syrian,  Italian, Indo-Chinese and more.  We serve fizzy drinks in special buffet glasses so you do not have to frequently head for replenishments.  Do not forget to leave space for a generous serving of a mithai and kulfi at the end.
services-service5Desc2: Veg buffet is priced at ₹290 per person and non-veg at ₹390.  Reserve your weekend evenings over
services-service5Desc3: by Friday 4 PM for the upcoming weekend and we promise to make it hard for you to get up and leave your canal side seat!
contact-address: Canal Point, Dream Park Road, Kathua, J&K 184102, India
